channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Actor Mickey Rourke faces eviction for claim of $59,000 unpaid rent at L.A. home
item.description: Hollywood icon Mickey Rourke is facing eviction from his leased Los Angeles home after his landlord accused him of falling behind on nearly $60,000 in...

item.title: We paid my daughter and son-in-law’s mortgage when it reached $76K. Here’s why we chose that magic figure.
item.description: “My husband, daughter, son-in-law and I all went to the bank.”

item.title: I’m 46 and I’m still use my ex-boyfriend’s Netflix account. Is that stealing?
item.description: “I’m still renting, believe it or not, and he has his own place.”

item.title: My friend, who had no children or wife, died suddenly. His sister is contesting his will. Will she succeed?
item.description: “He did not intend to leave anything to his sister, his only living relative.”

item.title: Running a business in a failed state: Cargill’s man with a ringside seat on the chaos in Venezuela

item.title: Thursday's big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The S&P 500 and the Dow Industrials touched fresh all-time highs in Wednesday's session, but ultimately closed lower on the day.

item.title: Trump says U.S. to ban large investors from buying homes
item.description: "I am immediately taking steps to ban large institutional investors from buying more single-family homes," Trump said.

item.title: Nvidia's Jensen Huang said he loves this company. The shares could nearly double this year, says one analyst
item.description: Analysts have gotten increasingly bullish on this company since announcing it has deployed the largest sidewalk delivery fleet in the U.S.

item.description: Monte Rosa Therapeutics (GLUE) stock surges over 42% on positive Phase 1 data for MRT-8102, showing profound reductions in inflammation marker hsCRP. ...

item.title: Buy this lithium stock that's set for a major rally this year after a strong 2025, says Baird
item.description: Baird's new $210 price target implies a potential upside of 33% ahead for Albemarle.

item.title: Sandisk is already up nearly 50% in 2026. Is it too late to buy?
item.description: After Sandisk's monster rally, the question is whether there's more room to run.
